name: Gen0Sec WAF Rule Generation MCP Server
description: Generate WAF rules and provide context information about WAF rules.

python_path.title: Path to Python executable
python_path.description: Path to the Python executable (python3 or python). Defaults to 'python3'.

validation_api_url.title: WAF validation API URL
validation_api_url.description: Full path to the WAF validation API URL. This value is passed as WAF_VALIDATION_API_URL environment variable and takes precedence over config.yaml when running as MCP extension.

nuclei_templates_version.title: Nuclei templates version
nuclei_templates_version.description: Version tag of nuclei-templates to download (e.g., v10.3.5). This value is passed as NUCLEI_TEMPLATES_VERSION environment variable and takes precedence over config.yaml when running as MCP extension. Ignored if nuclei_templates_auto_update is enabled.

nuclei_templates_auto_update.title: Auto-update nuclei templates
nuclei_templates_auto_update.description: If enabled, automatically downloads the latest nuclei-templates release from GitHub, ignoring the fixed version. This value is passed as NUCLEI_TEMPLATES_AUTO_UPDATE environment variable and takes precedence over config.yaml when running as MCP extension. If disabled, uses the version specified in nuclei_templates_version.
